name: Just One of the Guys Trivia Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of the actor that portrayed Terry's boyfriend Kevin?
questions.explanation:
Leigh McCloskey.

	Leigh has starred in several soap operas throughout his career.  He has portrayed characters on "General Hospital"; "The Young and the Restless"; "Santa Barbara"; and "One Life to Live".  He is perhaps best know for his role as Mitch Cooper on "Dallas".

questions.text: What was the name of Terry's journalism teacher?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Raymaker

	Mr. Raymaker told Terry that she was very pretty and she should be a model.  That made her very mad causing her to dress like a boy and go to a rival school to try and win the internship for the newspaper.

questions.text: What kind of car did Terry drive?
questions.explanation:
Ford Mustang.

	It was a white Ford Mustang Convertible.

questions.text: When Terry arrived at her new school, under her new identity as Terence Griffith, what did she do to avoid having to participate in gym class?
questions.correct: She set off the sprinklers in the bathroom and faked stomach pains
options: She gagged herself and threw up in front of the gym teacher
She made the best of it and participated.
questions.explanation:
She set off the sprinklers in the bathroom and faked stomach pains.

	She had to do all of this so that no one would find out that she was a girl.

questions.text: What did Terry tell Deborah to put on the back of her earring to hold it on?
questions.explanation:
end of a pencil eraser.

	Deborah seemed surprised that a guy would know what to do so Terry told her that she had sisters.

questions.text: What was the name of the newspaper that Terry wanted the summer internship at?
questions.explanation:
The Sun Tribune.

	Terry proved herself at Sturgis Wilder and made the cut for the internship, even with everything that she had to go through.

questions.text: What is the name of Terry's girl crazy brother?
questions.explanation:
Buddy.

	At the time this movie was made the actor that portrayed Buddy went by Billy Jacoby, he has since changed his name to Billy Jayne.

questions.text: Who did Terry take as her date to the prom?
questions.explanation:
Denise.

	She took her best friend Denise who ended up hooking up with a guy from the band.

questions.text: What did Sandy feed to Buddy's fish?
questions.explanation:
Pizza.

	She fed them the crust of pizza.

questions.text: What was the name of the guy that Denise ended up dating that was in the band at the prom?
questions.explanation:
Julian.

	She locked eyes with him and ended up getting a guy after all.
